name: Zombie Wave (Game Light)
description:
Zombie Wave is a offline top down shooter game with infinite number of zombies.

Zombies attacked on city and you are the only one who can save this city, pick up guns and survive as long as you can because there are more than zombies you think.

and also don't forget to buy some guns because more powerful gun equals to more time you can survive.

Game Features :-

- Infinite number of zombies.

- Guns shop
- Top down view.

- Mini-Map to track zombies location.

- City
